author: Ania Bessonov
title: When will children be back in school? Your COVID-19 questions answered
description: We're answering questions about the pandemic. Send yours to covid@cbc.ca and we’ll answer as many as we can. We’re publishing a selection of answers every weekday online, and also putting some of your questions to the experts during The National and on CBC Ne…
